Templates.Template: <XAL> <XALAction Type="assert"> <True Error="VALIDATION-ROOT-ERROR">{ local-name($form) eq 'UserProfile' }</True> <False Error="VALIDATION-PROFILE-FAILED">{ $form/Roles/Role[not(FunctionRef)] or $form/Roles/Role/FunctionRef[. eq ''] }</False> <True Error="VALIDATION-DUPLICATED-ROLE">{ count(distinct-values($form/Roles/Role/FunctionRef)) eq count($form/Roles/Role/FunctionRef) }</True> <False Error="PROTECT-ROLE-INTEGRITY-SR">{ exists($object/Roles/Role/FunctionRef[. eq '2']) and not($form/Roles/Role/FunctionRef[. eq '2']) }</False> <False Error="ROLE-SR-WRONG-SERVICE-REF">{ exists($form/Roles/Role/FunctionRef[. eq '2'][empty(../ServiceRef) or (count(../ServiceRef) > 1) or (../ServiceRef eq '')]) }</False> <False Error="ROLE-CAD-WRONG-CA-REF">{ exists($form/Roles/Role/FunctionRef[. eq '3'][empty(../CantonalAntennaRef) or (count(../CantonalAntennaRef) > 1) or (../CantonalAntennaRef eq '')]) }</False> <False Error="ROLE-COACH-EMPTY-SERVICE-REF">{ exists($form/Roles/Role/FunctionRef[. eq '4'][empty(../ServiceRef) or (../ServiceRef = '')]) }</False> <False Error="PROTECT-ADMIN-SYSTEM-ROLE">{ exists($object/Username) and ($object/Username eq oppidum:get-current-user()) and ($object/Roles/Role/FunctionRef[.='1']) and not($form/Roles/Role/FunctionRef[.='1']) }</False> </XALAction> </XAL>
